players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Bob: remained silent.
Diana: "I am not the one who killed Charlie. I believe we should focus on finding the real culprit and not accuse innocent town members."
You: "I agree with Diana. Let's focus on finding the real culprit and not accuse innocent town members based on speculation."

Diana: "I still believe that we should focus on finding the real culprit and not accuse innocent town members based on speculation. Let's work together to gather more information and narrow down the suspect pool."

You: "Let's continue our investigation with an open mind and focus on gathering facts to identify the real culprit. Accusing innocent town members based on speculation only creates confusion and hinders our progress towards finding the truth."

Bob: "Let's continue our investigation with an open mind and focus on gathering facts to identify the real culprit. We have already identified one suspect, but it's important that we don't jump to conclusions and consider all possibilities before making any accusations."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format), Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Alice (the vote was cast randomly because of a failed format)
Diana was arrested
